text: Consider the following ER model: child x Assume that notation (m1, ni) on the edge represent the minimum and maximum participation of an entity set in the relationship like an entity of type E1 may be related to at least m1 and at most nl entities of type E2. If the relational model derive from the above ER model then which of the following is the correct relational schema generated if all the relations are in 3NF? (2) PERSON(SSN, NAME, MotherSSN), MOTHER(SSN, Name) (b) PERSON(SSN, NAME), MOTHER(SSN, Name, ChildSSN) (c) PERSON(SSN, NAME, MotherSSN) (d) PERSON(SSN, NAME)
